channel.title: MOC [Mopar Official Clan]
channel.description:
[size=64pt][b]MOC[/b][/size] [size=16pt][b]Mopar Official Clan[/b][/size] [size=12pt][b] Open to EVERYONE[/b][/size] [b]Details:[/b] Official clan world - 111(members) Official hang out - Yanille Bank. Official non-member world has to be decided. The irc chat is #moc at irc.moparisthebest.com For you swiftswitch users go to File>Option>chatoptions>use own server... Type in irc.moparisthebest.com 6667 Go to http://moc.lagex.net/index.php to sign up and stuff.
(16:02:55) Hey mopar can you please approve this this -> http://moc.lagex.net/index.php (16:03:04) (Mopar's Official Clan) (16:11:38) ok, approved
Some more stuff: This clan is run by me and pookey71. We just basically made this clan, will be updating more and more. This is just a fun clan, no commitment at all so ANYONE can join. I at the moment am training to 99 fletch and pookey is doing random tasks. We will be holding events that anyone can come too as well which will be posted here when we know more about them and have more information to give. If you want to be a part of this clan or have ideas please post. We may also be making ranks and stuff. [b]Users:[/b] mopar name davidude36 pookey71 If you wish to know our runescape usernames please ask through PM (this is for security reasons).

they wouldnt ban you would they? just cos you are a member…

Were keeping this clan strictly Mopar only.Not runescape at all :S

item.title: MOC [Mopar Official Clan]
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[size=64pt]MOC[/size]
[size=16pt]Mopar Official Clan[/size]
[size=12pt] Open to EVERYONE[/size]

Details:
Official clan world - 111(members)
Official hang out - Yanille Bank.
Official non-member world has to be decided.
The irc chat is #moc at irc.moparisthebest.com
For you swiftswitch users go to File>Option>chatoptions>use own server…
Type in irc.moparisthebest.com 6667

Go to http://moc.lagex.net/index.php to sign up and stuff.

(16:02:55) Hey mopar can you please approve this this -> http://moc.lagex.net/index.php (16:03:04) (Mopar's Official Clan) (16:11:38) ok, approved

Some more stuff:

This clan is run by me and pookey71.

We just basically made this clan, will be updating more and more.
This is just a fun clan, no commitment at all so ANYONE can join.

I at the moment am training to 99 fletch and pookey is doing random tasks.

We will be holding events that anyone can come too as well which will be posted here when we know more about them and have more information to give.

If you want to be a part of this clan or have ideas please post.

We may also be making ranks and stuff.

Users:
mopar name

davidude36
pookey71

If you wish to know our runescape usernames please ask through PM (this is for security reasons).

Read full topic
